abstract: Through the deal, its second with E.ON in a year, PPL will run the biggest network of electricity delivery companies in Britain.
snippet: Through the deal, its second with E.ON in a year, PPL will run the biggest network of electricity delivery companies in Britain.
lead_paragraph: PPL agreed late Tuesday to buy the British electrical grid business of Germany’s E.ON for about $5.6 billion in cash, significantly expanding its operations in that country.

headline.main: PPL to Buy E.ON’s British Power Grid for $5.6 Billion

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
